name: Project Cube Adventure
description:
This is a full remake of my very old game called Shape Adventure. For now im making a test level to get players feedback on my game. So pls report any bug and whatsoever...

How to play (pc)

Arrow keys to move.Up arrow to jump and Down arrow to look down.X to jump as well and Z to fallthru. 

How to play (mobile)

A to jump and b to fallthru.

Powerupps :

Green triangle : double jump.

Red Square : ground pound (press Z or B (mobile))

Blue circle : moves faster.

Btw, things like coins,powerupps and enemies respawn over time so you can use it again...
